spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but there are clear window placement errors on the North and West walls compared to the 2D source. The double windows in the kitchen/bedroom areas do not match the segmented framing in the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present and correctly adjacent. Internal wall thicknesses are mostly consistent, though the bathroom partition door swing is rendered as a static archway/curved wall fragment rather than a functional door.

furniture_mapping.notes: Strong correlation between 2D icons and 3D assets. The dining table and kitchen island orientation is correct. Small scale issues on the patio plants.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting and shadows are consistent. Clean geometry with no major artifacts, although the text labeling is baked into the floor texture.

detected_errors.description: Windows on the North wall are merged into double-panes, deviating from the 2D plan's segmented window units.
Bathroom door and bedroom entrance door show incorrect swing representation/curved wall segments.
Hallucinated floor text labels ('Bedroom', 'Kitchen/Living') rendered directly onto the 3D floor surface.
The balcony railing/wall is partially transparent or missing a top cap in the lower-left foreground section.
